full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA GCIG MKHA' 'GRO SNYAN RGYUD KYI PHYI 'TSAMS CHEN MO'I 'GRO TSUL GSAL BAR BYED PA'I YI GE DANG PA'I MCHU SGROS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (CES MA CIG MKHA' GRO SNYAN RGYUD KYI PHYI 'TSAMS CHEN CHA MOR 'GRO TSUL GSAL BAR BYED PA'I YI GE DANG PA'I MTHU SGROL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS BDE THANG DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DANG, ,SHIS TSAD DGOS GSAR SHER GLING GNAS BSTAN PA'I MDZED RGYAN SPRAL PA'I SKYES MCHOG TU MA DANG, DAD LDAN GYI BU SLOB MANG POS YANG YANG BSKUL ZHING, GZHAN YANG LAM 'DI LA MOS PA'I DON GNYER CAN DU MAS NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA'I NGO MA LDOG PAR, ,SANGS RGYAS KUN DUS KYI NGO BO KUN MKHYEN CHEN PO 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE SKU 'PHRENG RIM BYON YAB SRAS RNAMS KYI, ,ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR BRTEN PA'I BKA' DRIN LAS, ,LUGS 'DI'I SMIN BYED CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA RDZOGS PAR THOB PA'I BTZUN GZUGS BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS TSAD LDAN GYI GZHUNG DANG BLA MA'I MANG DAG LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,)
